casebody.data:
Tyrone S. HENRY, Sr., Individually and as the Administrator of the Estate of Tyrone S. Henry, Jr., Plaintiff,
v.
Santosh S. BHOWMIK, Defendant,
and
CURE Auto Insurance, Defendant-Movant,
and
The New Jersey Property Liability Insurance Guaranty Association, Defendant-Respondent. M-1299/1300 September Term 2017
080811 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 15, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of the Citizens United Reciprocal Exchange (CURE Auto Insurance) for leave to file a motion for leave to appeal as within time (M-1299) is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal (M-1300) is denied.
